name: Meloddyssey
description:
Your goal is to discover your long lost home. Maneuver past bandits and snakes and through water to transition to the next part of your journey. This game is quite hard but I encourage you to do your best to beat it! It is also best enjoyed in full screen mode.

Movement - wasd/arrows, Esc. to pause the game.

Be sure to tweet @moistwaterplug and tell me what you thought of the game and maybe how you would've made it. Unfortunately I wasn't able to make a video of the creation of this game because I don't have the best laptop. This was made in 48 hours for Mizjam and I hope you enjoy !
